parser.commentExpr: (?x) # Utilize inline comments (see `RegEx - Pattern Modifiers`) (?m-s:(?i:REM)(?:\h.+)?$) # Single Line Comment 1 | (?m-s::{2}.*$) # Single Line Comment 2

function.mainExpr: (?x) # Utilize inline comments (see `RegEx - Pattern Modifiers`) (?m-s) # enforce strict line by line search ^ # label starts at the beginning of a line,... \h* # ...can be preceded by blank characters and : # ...starts with a colon \K # keep the text matched so far, out of the overall match \w # a label name has to start with a word character,... [\w.\-]+ # ...the remainder of the name can contain dots and minus signs and \b # ...ends at a word boundary i.e. discard any trailing characters
